Uses of Package
com.badlogic.gdx.ai.fma

  • Packages that use com.badlogic.gdx.ai.fma 
    Package Description
    com.badlogic.gdx.ai.fma  
    com.badlogic.gdx.ai.fma.patterns  
  • Classes in com.badlogic.gdx.ai.fma used by com.badlogic.gdx.ai.fma 
    Class and Description
    BoundedSlotAssignmentStrategy
    BoundedSlotAssignmentStrategy is an abstract implementation of SlotAssignmentStrategy that supports roles.
    FormationMember
    Game characters coordinated by a Formation must implement this interface.
    FormationMotionModerator
    A FormationMotionModerator moderates the movement of the formation based on the current positions of the members in its slots: in effect to keep the anchor point on a leash.
    FormationPattern
    The FormationPattern interface represents the shape of a formation and generates the slot offsets, relative to its anchor point.
    SlotAssignment
    A SlotAssignment instance represents the assignment of a single FormationMember to its slot in the Formation.
    SlotAssignmentStrategy
    This interface defines how each FormationMember is assigned to a slot in the Formation.
    SoftRoleSlotAssignmentStrategy.SlotCostProvider 
  • Classes in com.badlogic.gdx.ai.fma used by com.badlogic.gdx.ai.fma.patterns 
    Class and Description
    FormationPattern
    The FormationPattern interface represents the shape of a formation and generates the slot offsets, relative to its anchor point.
